009package Ch22_Pixel_Interpolation;
010
011import Ch21_Geometric_Operations.Draw_Test_Grid;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
018import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
019import imagingbook.common.image.access.ImageAccessor;
020import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
021
022/**
023 * <p>
024 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of various pixel interpolation methods and out-of-bounds strategies.
025 * Sub-pixel translation is used as the geometric transformation (parameters can be specified). Note the use if the
026 * {@link ImageAccessor} class which gives uniform access to all types of images. See Ch. 22 of [1] for more details.
027 * </p>
028 * <p>
029 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
030 * (2022).
031 * </p>
032 *
033 * @author WB
034 * @version 2022/11/28
035 * @see InterpolationMethod
036 * @see OutOfBoundsStrategy
037 * @see ImageAccessor
038 */
039public class Pixel_Interpolation_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
040        
041        private static InterpolationMethod IPM = InterpolationMethod.Bicubic;
042        private static OutOfBoundsStrategy OBS = OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues;
043        
044        private static double dx = 10.50;       // translation parameters
045        private static double dy = -3.25;
046        
047        private ImagePlus im;
048        
049        /**
050         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
051         * is currently open.
052         */
053        public Pixel_Interpolation_Demo() {
054//              if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage()) {
055//                      DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
056//              }
057                if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage() && DialogUtils.askForSampleImage()) {
058                        IjUtils.runPlugIn(Draw_Test_Grid.class);
059                }
060        }
061        
062        // ----------------------------------------
063        
064    @Override
065        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
066        this.im = im;
067        return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
068    }
069
070    @Override
071        public void run(ImageProcessor source) {
072        if (!runDialog())
073                        return;
074        
075        final int w = source.getWidth();
076        final int h = source.getHeight();
077        
078        // create the target image (same type as source):
079        ImageProcessor target = source.createProcessor(w, h);
080        
081        // create ImageAccessor's for the source and target  image:
082        ImageAccessor sA = ImageAccessor.create(source, OBS, IPM);
083        ImageAccessor tA = ImageAccessor.create(target);
084        
085        // iterate over all pixels of the target image:
086        for (int u = 0; u < w; u++) {   // discrete target position (u,v)
087                for (int v = 0; v < h; v++) {
088                        double x = u + dx;      // continuous source position (x,y)
089                        double y = v + dy;
090                        float[] val = sA.getPix(x, y);
091                        tA.setPix(u, v, val);   // update target pixel
092                }
093        }
094        
095        // display the target image:
096        (new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle() + "-" + IPM.toString(), target)).show();
097    }
098    
099    // --------------------------------------------
100    
101        private boolean runDialog() {
102                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
103                gd.addNumericField("Translation dx", dx, 2);
104                gd.addNumericField("Translation dy", dy, 2);
105                gd.addEnumChoice("Interpolation method", IPM);
106                gd.addEnumChoice("Out-of-bounds strategy", OBS);
107
108                gd.showDialog();
109                if (gd.wasCanceled())
110                        return false;
111                
112                dx = gd.getNextNumber();
113                dy = gd.getNextNumber();
114                IPM = gd.getNextEnumChoice(InterpolationMethod.class);
115                OBS = gd.getNextEnumChoice(OutOfBoundsStrategy.class);
116                return true;
117        }
118}
